name: Chapter 3: The Ceremony
short_description: The away team attends a grand Codarian coding ceremony where they witness the synchronization of the Codarians' codes. During the event, Data identifies an unusual pattern in the codes that suggests a hidden message.
people: Commander Riker, Data, Deanna Troi, Codarian leaders, Codarian coders
from_prev_chapter: The away team is invited to a Codarian cultural event.
to_next_chapter: Data deciphers part of the hidden message and realizes it may contain a warning.
